label: [LinkedIn] Create post
info: This is a continuation of the [LinkedIn OAuth flow](https://flowhub.org/f/fafd7c807c192d4a). Once the user has accepted, this flow obtains an `access_token` using the `linked-code` provided by the [previous flow](https://flowhub.org/f/fafd7c807c192d4a). The flow then creates a post in the users feed. This flows uses the `BlogPages` node that provides details on the page to be posted into the users feed. This provides the title, summary and image for the blog page. These are added to the post on LinkedIn. What attributes are required can be seen in the final function node, the code is below. Environment variables: - `LINKEDIN_CLIENT_ID` which is the client id of the application defined at LinkedIn - `LINKEDIN_OAUTH_REDIRECT_URL` is the authentication redirect URL set in the application - `LINKEDIN_CLIENT_SECRET` this is the secret is set as part of the definition of the LinkedIn application ### Sequence Diagram ```mermaid sequenceDiagram Flow->>Flow: Obtain blog page details Flow->>LinkedIn (oauth): provide access_token for linkedin code LinkedIn (oauth)->>Flow: access_token for user Flow->>Flow: store access_token and prepare to obtain user_id Flow->>LinkedIn (api): provide user_id LinkedIn (api)->>Flow: user_id alt have preview image? par obtain details Flow->>CDN: obtain image data CDN->>Flow: Image data Flow->>LinkedIn (api): obtain image upload URL LinkedIn (api)->>Flow: Upload URL and Image URN end Flow->>LinkedIn(UploadURL): Send image data LinkedIn(UploadURL)->>Flow: Status 201 Flow->>Flow: prepare details for image post to LinkedIn else no preview image Flow->>Flow: prepare details for article post to LinkedIn end Flow->>LinkedIn (api): post share with page details on users feed ``` ### Code The final function node does all the heavy lifting, creating the content for the post. ### External resources - [Obtaining File URN](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/linkedin/marketing/integrations/community-management/shares/images-api) - [File Upload](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/linkedin/marketing/integrations/community-management/shares/vector-asset-api?view=li-lms-2023-08&tabs=http#upload-the-image) - [Creating an Image Share](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-gb/linkedin/consumer/integrations/self-serve/share-on-linkedin#create-an-image-share)
